page.title: 10A DAY IN MY LIFE(1ST SCHOOL)
page.content: Wednesday:In the morning I get out of bed and get washed and dressed.I go down stairs to have my breakfast and then I brush my teeth and do my hair. Ihave it in a ponytail or a plait.One week my mummy takes me to school and another my nextdoor neighbour takes me.At school I work very hard trying to get all my work right.On Wednesday we allways get roast and roast potatoes and cabbage.If we hurry up with lunch we can have an extra play.I play with Lisa and Rachel.At school we have an adventure playground.We also have apparatus inside and out at school we have singing lessons and assembly and lots of hard lessons like maths and other things.so I have some busy days and when I get home I have a little play before I go to bed and I brush my teeth and say goodnight.Then I read a book before I go to sleep.
